name: Quantum Forge
description:
Quantum Forge is a game where you make clones of yourself to work around the forge to complete tasks.

The game only has 4 levels. After the 4th you will be sent back to the main menu.

Controls 

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Interact

I - Make a clone that copies your actions

O - To reset your actions

P - To reset your previous clones actions

TAB - Open recipe sheet
